de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.message

Interface Writer<T extends Data,S>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the data to be accepted
    S - the type of the destination
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImWriter<T>, TnccsWriter<T>, TransportWriter<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaAttributeAssessmentResultValueWriter, PaAttributeAttributeRequestValueWriter, PaAttributeErrorInformationInvalidParamValueWriter, PaAttributeErrorInformationUnsupportedAttributeValueWriter, PaAttributeErrorInformationUnsupportedVersionValueWriter, PaAttributeErrorValueWriter, PaAttributeFactoryDefaultPasswordEnabledValueWriter, PaAttributeForwardingEnabledValueWriter, PaAttributeHeaderWriter, PaAttributeInstalledPackagesValueWriter, PaAttributeNumericVersionValueWriter, PaAttributeOperationalStatusValueWriter, PaAttributePortFilterValueWriter, PaAttributeProductInformationValueWriter, PaAttributeRemediationParameterStringValueWriter, PaAttributeRemediationParametersValueWriter, PaAttributeRemediationParameterUriValueWriter, PaAttributeStringVersionValueWriter, PaAttributeTestingValueWriter, PaMessageHeaderWriter, PaWriter, PbBatchHeaderWriter, PbMessageAccessRecommendationValueWriter, PbMessageAssessmentResultValueWriter, PbMessageErrorParameterOffsetValueWriter, PbMessageErrorParameterVersionValueWriter, PbMessageErrorValueWriter, PbMessageExperimentalValueWriter, PbMessageHeaderWriter, PbMessageImValueWriter, PbMessageLanguagePreferenceValueWriter, PbMessageReasonStringValueWriter, PbMessageRemediationParameterStringValueWriter, PbMessageRemediationParametersValueWriter, PbMessageRemediationParameterUriValueWriter, PbWriter, PtTlsMessageErrorValueWriter, PtTlsMessageExperimentalValueWriter, PtTlsMessageHeaderWriter, PtTlsMessagePbBatchValueWriter, PtTlsMessageSaslAutenticationDataValueWriter, PtTlsMessageSaslMechanismSelectionValueWriter, PtTlsMessageSaslMechanismsValueWriter, PtTlsMessageSaslResultValueWriter, PtTlsMessageVersionRequestValueWriter, PtTlsMessageVersionResponseValueWriter, PtTlsWriter

    public interface Writer<T extends Data,S>
    Generic base for a writer, that accepts a message object and serializes it to the given destination.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void write(T data, S destination)
      Writes the given message data to the given destination after serialization.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(T data,
         S destination)
           throws SerializationException
        Writes the given message data to the given destination after serialization.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to serialize and write
        destination - the destination to write to
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if serialization or writing fails
